Rialto.Rialto Municipal Airport:
Rialto Municipal Airport (FAA LID: L67), originally Miro Field, was a general aviation airport three miles (5 km) northwest of Rialto, in San Bernardino County, California.
It was used by private aircraft; no airlines flew into this airport. The airport was about 12 miles northeast of Ontario International Airport and ten miles west of San Bernardino International Airport.
